data.eml:eml: A new species and new record of the Kamakidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jung, Tae Won, Yoon, Seong Myeong (2015): A new species and new record of the Kamakidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Korea. Zootaxa 3915 (3): 356-374, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3915.3.2
